Body: The vowel analysis in Chomsky and Halle's (1968) SPE is said to be overly abstract. What are the main issues phonologists have with this abstractness?
Title: What are the main issues concerning the abstractness of the theory set out in The Sound Pattern of English?

LastEditedUser.AboutMe: Fourth Year Undergraduate Linguistics and English Language student.

OwnerUser.AboutMe: Fourth Year Undergraduate Linguistics and English Language student.
